cscie160.hw2

Class Floor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie160.hw2.Floor

  • public class Floor
extends java.lang.Object
    This creates a Floor system in the implemented Real World Elevator stimulation system
    Since:
    - 10/08/2012
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    KALPAN

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int floorNumber
      This represents Floor No.
      private int onFloorPassengers
      This indicates total no of passengers moving on the floor but not waiting.
      private int passengersWaiting
      This indicates total no of passengers waiting on the floor to reach to any other floor in building

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Floor(int floorNumber)
      This will construct a Floor with onFloorPassengers set to 0

    • Field Detail

      • passengersWaiting

        private int passengersWaiting
        This indicates total no of passengers waiting on the floor to reach to any other floor in building

      • onFloorPassengers

        private int onFloorPassengers
        This indicates total no of passengers moving on the floor but not waiting.

      • floorNumber

        private int floorNumber
        This represents Floor No. 1 through 7

    • Constructor Detail

      • Floor

        public Floor(int floorNumber)
        This will construct a Floor with onFloorPassengers set to 0
        Parameters:
        floorNumber - - represents Floor No
        passengersWaiting - - represents total no of witing passengers

    • Method Detail

      • unloadPassengers

        public void unloadPassengers(Elevator e)
        This method unloads destined passengers from elevator to the floor. It then calls boardpassenger method to board the waiting passengers. If ElevatorFullExcepton is thrown it will stop boarding further processing and remaining passengers will be picked in the next round.
        Parameters:
        e - - Represents object instance of class Elevator

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This Overridden method will print the status of the Floor object. It will display passengers roaming on the floor, its floor number and total Passengers waiting on the floor.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
